title: [1508521049] Unboxing The NEW fi'zi:k 2018 Saddle Range | Win With GCN!
description:
Thanks to fi'zi:k for sending us these products to unbox. All views expressed in this video are the presenter's own.

We've seen fi'zi:k's new road shoes, and even their off road models over with our friends at GMBN. Now it's time for their 2018 saddle range, which Simon Richardson is here to unveil for the first time. 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN

The Spine Concept System devised by fi'zi:k is a quick and easy way for any rider to find out which of these saddles will be most suitable specifically for you.

The flexibility in your hamstrings and lower back will determine the angle of your pelvis when you are in the saddle. This pelvis angle will impact on the saddle suitability, so the different ranges are designed to take this into account. 

Fancy your chances to become one of our 5 lucky winners? To be entered into our competition to win your choice of a saddle and pair of shoes, click here

asset.title: Unboxing The NEW fi'zi:k 2018 Saddle Range | Win With GCN!
asset.description:
Thanks to fi'zi:k for sending us these products to unbox. All views expressed in this video are the presenter's own.

We've seen fi'zi:k's new road shoes, and even their off road models over with our friends at GMBN. Now it's time for their 2018 saddle range, which Simon Richardson is here to unveil for the first time. 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN

The Spine Concept System devised by fi'zi:k is a quick and easy way for any rider to find out which of these saddles will be most suitable specifically for you.

The flexibility in your hamstrings and lower back will determine the angle of your pelvis when you are in the saddle. This pelvis angle will impact on the saddle suitability, so the different ranges are designed to take this into account. 

Fancy your chances to become one of our 5 lucky winners? To be entered into our competition to win your choice of a saddle and pair of shoes, click here 👉   http://gcn.eu/fizik2018

The new 2018 range includes;

Arione
Antares
Aliante
Women's Specific Luce
Versus Evo
The Open range - available in Arione, Antares and Aliante

All models are available in regular or wide.
Most saddles are available in these three models;
 -R3 (k:ium alloy rail)
 -R1 (carbon rail)
 -00 (carbon rail and shell) 

Enter the competition for your chance to win here 👉   http://gcn.eu/fizik2018

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍  http://gcn.eu/ml

Watch more on GCN...
GMBN fi'zi:k 2018 MTB Shoes  📹  http://gcn.eu/GMBNshoes
fi'zi:k 2018 Road Cycling Shoes 📹  http://gcn.eu/Fizik2018

Photos: © Bettiniphoto / http://www.bettiniphoto.net/ & ©Tim De Waele / http://www.tdwsport.com

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
